Summary: Same price as stores, lesser product
text: I am a fan of the double bergamot stash earl grey from stores in packs of 18.  This bulk box does not contain the same quality product.  I don't know if it just sits around too long, or my order contained an off-season batch, but when you can go to target and get the same 100 bags for about $1 more than the subscribe and save price for a better product, why buy in bulk?
